name: uk_branch_lookup
description: Searches for the closest Barclays Branch in the UK given a valid location name or postal code using geocoding.

location.description: this can be a place name in the UK or a valid UK postal code

instruction: If the first lookup fails or the location is ambiguous, DO NOT GUESS. Instead, strictly ask the user to spell out the location letter-by-letter (e.g., "S-K-E-G-N-E-S-S"). On the next turn, combine their spelled letters into a single location name and retry the lookup.
